author: travelandtourworld.com
title: IATA inks strategic partnership with ID TECH - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
IATA inks strategic partnership with ID TECH Published on : Tuesday, August 25, 2015
ID TECH, a leading manufacturer of secure payment solutions, mobile payment readers, point of sale peripherals, and digital signage, is proud to announce its membership of the Strategic Partnership program of the International Air Transport Association (IATA).
“We are excited to join IATA’s Strategic Partnerships program. ID TECH has been working with IATA PCI work group on solutions to solve unique challenges in the airline industry such as payment on shared kiosks. Together we are making great progress with the active participation from many airlines and other payment system partners,” stated George Jiang, CTO at ID TECH.
The partnership with IATA allows for ID TECH to integrate their secure payment hardware expertise into the airline industry. As a global leader in the payment industry, ID TECH prides itself in providing the highest level of security and functionality to meet the needs of the continuously changing payment industry. The collaboration between IATA and ID TECH provides airlines with the confidence of the latest payment technology in the industry.
